Title: Glanville Williams: Learning the Law
Author: গ্যালানভিলে উইলিয়ামস্‌
Summary:
Glanville Williams: Learning the Law 14th Edition is a comprehensive book for law students or anyone who wants a career in law. The book gives students a basic understanding of the law and explains the statutes and look-up points in law.
